[shillelagh.adapter]
csvfile = shillelagh.adapters.file.csvfile:CSVFile
gsheetsapi = shillelagh.adapters.api.gsheets:GSheetsAPI
weatherapi = shillelagh.adapters.api.weatherapi:WeatherAPI

[sqlalchemy.dialects]
gsheets = shillelagh.backends.apsw.dialect:APSWGSheetsDialect
shillelagh = shillelagh.backends.apsw.dialect:APSWDialect
shillelagh.apsw = shillelagh.backends.apsw.dialect:APSWDialect
shillelagh.safe = shillelagh.backends.apsw.dialect:APSWSafeDialect
